mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nick = #{nick}, email = #{email}, password = CASE WHEN #{password} IS NULL OR #{password} = '' THEN password ELSE #{password} END WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, nick, email, password, user_type AS userType, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, last_login_at AS lastLoginAt, user_current_point AS userCurrentPoint FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE nick = #{nick}
